name: SEOM Interactive
tagline: It's not about clicks. It's about results.
description:
SEOM Interactive is comprised of search engine and internet marketing specialists who understand how to leverage the power of interactive media. Not only do we understand it, but we love it. We know. We’re nerds. We enjoy getting to know each client’s challenges, goals, and unique selling points. We then craft a search engine strategy to achieve these goals. Strategies may include PPC Advertising, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Optimization, and Website Design.
We have people on our team who have been designing and optimizing websites since the early 90s. Others are Google Adwords certified professionals. Since content is king, we have talented website and SEO copywriters who create ad copy and search engine friendly copy for any website. Our search engine marketing firm is located in Bucks County, Pennsylvania, just outside of Philadelphia, although we serve clients nationwide.
